elements.name: s11q1i1
elements.title:
Does one of the following apply to EVERY piece of personal information your organization handles from Europe?
1. Your organization received consent to handle the personal information.

2. Your organization is under contract to handle the personal information.

3. Your organization has a legal obligation to handle the personal information.

4. Your organization is protecting people's vital interest (or a third party's vital interest) by handling the personal information.

5. Your organization is protecting a public interest by handling the personal information.
elements.correctAnswer: We have personal information where NONE of these apply

choices.text: We have personal information where NONE of these apply
One of these applies to EVERY piece of personal information

elements.name: s11q2i1
elements.title:
We need to ask you the same question in a different way.
Be prepared to answer seemingly repetitive questions.

elements.name: s11q3i1
elements.title:
There are several categories of personal information that are important for the GDPR.
You may have seen this list before. But it's important to the next question. 

1. Identifying information: names, age, birth date, government ID, user-names, passwords, etc. 

2. Opinions, beliefs, or personal preference data: religious and political beliefs, buying habits, likes and dislikes, etc.

3. Physical characteristics data: height, weight, hair color, eye color, race, fingerprint, voice, etc. 

4. Personal history data: work history, marriages, relationships, education, addresses, criminal record, etc. 

5. Social and contact information: phone number, address, friend networks, social groups, family, etc. 

6. Financial data: credit cards, bank accounts, debit accounts, investments, etc. 

7. Tracking data: monitoring physical movement, internet history, phone usage, app usage, etc.

elements.name: s11q4i1
elements.title:
Select the types of personal information your organization handles.
To be thorough, we need to ask you questions about each category. You're making great progress.

choices.text: Opinions, beliefs, or personal preferences data

elements.name: s11q5i1
elements.title: We need to ask you about the "Identifying information" your organization handles.

elements.name: s11q6i1
elements.title:
Do any of the following apply to the "Identifying information" your organization handles?
1. Your organization received consent to handle the personal information.

2. Your organization is under contract to handle the personal information.

3. Your organization has a legal obligation to handle the personal information.

4. Your organization is protecting people's vital interest (or a third party's vital interest) by handling the personal information.

5. Your organization is protecting a public interest by handling the personal information.

elements.name: s11q7i1
elements.title:
What is included in the "Identifying information" that your organization handles?
Sample answer: "The personal information includes phone numbers, emails, addresses, and date of birth."

elements.name: s11q8i1
elements.title:
Does the "Identifying information" include any of the following?
These are considered "Special Categories" of information under the GDPR. If any of the following are included, please consider discussing this form with an attorney.

choices.text: Information from a child below the age of 16
Information about a person's ethnic origin
Information about a person's political opinions

elements.name: s11q9i1
elements.title:
How was the "Identifying information" collected?
Sample Answer: "The personal information was collected by the organization's mobile app."

elements.name: s11q10i1
elements.title:
Why is your organization handling people's "Identifying information"?
Describe the purpose behind your organization's actions with regard to the personal information. 

Sample answer: "The organization is using the personal information to improve its marketing."

Other uses include: selling the information, improving user experiences, providing services, authenticating accounts, etc.

elements.name: s11q11i1
elements.title:
Why is it important that your organization handle people's "Identifying information"?
Sample answer: "The organization needs the personal information in order to advertise its products more efficiently."

elements.name: s11q12i1
elements.title: Could your organization realistically accomplish its purposes WITHOUT handling people's "Identifying information"?

elements.name: s11q13i1
elements.title:
Describe how your organization could achieve the same purpose without handling people's "Identifying information".
Sample answer: "Instead of using the personal data, the organization could track overall sales data by region to try and isolate the important factors in advertising."

elements.name: s11q14i1
elements.title:
How would your organization be affected if it could not handle people's "Identifying information"?
Sample answer: "The organization would not be able to advertise as effectively and people would receive advertisements they don't want or need."

elements.name: s11q15i1
elements.title: Is it important to third parties that your organization handle people's "Identifying information"?

elements.name: s11q16i1
elements.title:
Why is it important to third parties?
Sample answer: "Third parties rely on the organization's advertising data to determine what products would be of interest to the organization's customers."

elements.name: s11q17i1
elements.title: Could third parties accomplish their purpose without your organization handling people's "Identifying information"?

elements.name: s11q18i1
elements.title:
How would those third parties be affected if your organization could not handle people's "Identifying information"?
Sample answer: "The third parties would not receive the advertising data they need to market their products."

elements.name: s11q19i1
elements.title: Do people expect their "Identifying information" to be handled by your organization?

elements.name: s11q20i1
elements.title: Have people been notified that your organization handles their "Identifying information" in this way?

elements.name: s11q21i1
elements.title:
Describe how people benefit by your organization handling their "Identifying information."
Sample answer: "People only receive advertisements that are likely to interest them."

elements.name: s11q22i1
elements.title:
Describe how people could be harmed by your organization handling their "Identifying information."
Sample answer: "People are not harmed by the organization's use of their personal information."

elements.name: s11q23i1
elements.title:
Overall, is it in people's best interest to have your organization handle their personal information? Explain why or why not.
Sample answer: "The organization's use of the personal information is in people's best interest because it increases their user experience. Nothing harmful occurs to them as a result."

elements.name: s11q24i1
elements.title:
Are the interests of the organization aligned with the interests of the people who the data was collected from? Explain why or why not.
Sample answer: "The interests are aligned. Customers only want to see advertisements they are interested in. The organization only wants to spend money on advertising to people who want to see relevant advertisements."

elements.name: s11q25i1
elements.title:
Are people able to do all of the following with regard to their "Identifying information"?
1. Request access to their personal information

2. Request that their personal information be erased

3. Request that their personal information be corrected

4. Request that the organization stop using their data in a certain way

5. Object to how your organization handles their personal information

elements.name: s11q26i1
elements.title:
Based on your previous answers, do you believe your organization is justified in handling people's "Identifying information"?
Weigh the benefits against the harms (or potential harms) of using the data.

Sample answer: "The organization is justified in using the personal information because the benefit to both customers and the organization is significant. There is minimal risk to the customers' privacy. The personal information is also important to third parties."

elements.name: s11q27i1
elements.title: Will your organization continue to handle people's "Identifying information"?

elements.name: s11q28i1
elements.title:
We're done asking about the "Identifying information."
If you're organization handles other types of personal information, we'll ask you about those. If not, we're almost done with the document.

elements.name: s11q29i1
elements.title: We need to ask you about the "Opinions, beliefs, or personal preferences data" your organization handles.

elements.name: s11q30i1
elements.title:
Do any of the following apply to the "Opinions, beliefs, or personal preferences data" your organization handles?
1. Your organization received consent to handle the personal information.

2. Your organization is under contract to handle the personal information.

3. Your organization has a legal obligation to handle the personal information.

4. Your organization is protecting people's vital interest (or a third party's vital interest) by handling the personal information.

5. Your organization is protecting a public interest by handling the personal information.

Information about a person's trade union membership

elements.title:
Are the interests of the organization aligned with the interests of the people who the data was collected from? Explain why or why not.
Sample answer: "The interests are aligned. Customers only want to see advertisements they are interested in. The organization only wants to spend money on advertising to people who want to see relevant advertisements."

elements.name: s11q123i1
elements.title:
Are people able to do all of the following with regard to their "Social and contact information"?
1. Request access to their personal information

2. Request that their personal information be erased

3. Request that their personal information be corrected

4. Request that the organization stop using their data in a certain way

5. Object to how your organization handles their personal information

elements.name: s11q124i1
elements.title:
Based on your previous answers, do you believe your organization is justified in handling people's "Social and contact information"?
Weigh the benefits against the harms (or potential harms) of using the data.

Sample answer: "The organization is justified in using the personal information because the benefit to both customers and the organization is significant. There is minimal risk to the customers' privacy. The personal information is also important to third parties."

elements.name: s11q125i1
elements.title: Will your organization continue to handle people's "Social and contact information"?

elements.name: s11q126i1
elements.title:
We're done asking about the "Social and contact information."
If you're organization handles other types of personal information, we'll ask you about those. If not, we're almost done with the document.

elements.name: s11q127i1
elements.title: We need to ask you about the "Financial data" your organization handles.

elements.name: s11q128i1
elements.title:
Do any of the following apply to the "Financial data" your organization handles?
1. Your organization received consent to handle the personal information.

2. Your organization is under contract to handle the personal information.

3. Your organization has a legal obligation to handle the personal information.

4. Your organization is protecting people's vital interest (or a third party's vital interest) by handling the personal information.

5. Your organization is protecting a public interest by handling the personal information.

elements.name: s11q129i1
elements.title:
What is included in the "Financial data" that your organization handles?
Sample answer: "The personal information includes phone numbers, emails, addresses, and date of birth."

elements.name: s11q130i1
elements.title:
Does the "Financial data" include any of the following?
These are considered "Special Categories" of information under the GDPR. If any of the following are included, please consider discussing this form with an attorney.

choices.text: Information from a child below the age of 16
Information about a person's ethnic origin
Information about a person's political opinions
Information about a person's religious or philosophical beliefs
Information about a person's trade union membership
Information about a person's sex life or sexual orientation

elements.name: s11q131i1
elements.title:
How was the "Financial data" collected?
Sample Answer: "The personal information was collected by the organization's mobile app."

elements.name: s11q132i1
elements.title:
Why is your organization handling people's "Financial data"?
Describe the purpose behind your organization's actions with regard to the personal information. 

Sample answer: "The organization is using the personal information to improve its marketing."

Other uses include: selling the information, improving user experiences, providing services, authenticating accounts, etc.

elements.name: s11q133i1
elements.title:
Why is it important that your organization handle people's "Financial data"?
Sample answer: "The organization needs the personal information in order to advertise its products more efficiently."

elements.name: s11q134i1
elements.title: Could your organization realistically accomplish its purposes WITHOUT handling people's "Financial data"?

elements.name: s11q135i1
elements.title:
Describe how your organization could achieve the same purpose without handling people's "Financial data".
Sample answer: "Instead of using the personal data, the organization could track overall sales data by region to try and isolate the important factors in advertising."

elements.name: s11q136i1
elements.title:
How would your organization be affected if it could not handle people's "Financial data"?
Sample answer: "The organization would not be able to advertise as effectively and people would receive advertisements they don't want or need."

elements.name: s11q137i1
elements.title: Is it important to third parties that your organization handle people's "Financial data"?

elements.name: s11q138i1
elements.title:
Why is it important to third parties?
Sample answer: "Third parties rely on the organization's advertising data to determine what products would be of interest to the organization's customers."

elements.name: s11q139i1
elements.title: Could third parties accomplish their purpose without your organization handling people's "Financial data"?

elements.name: s11q140i1
elements.title:
How would those third parties be affected if your organization could not handle people's "Financial data"?
Sample answer: "The third parties would not receive the advertising data they need to market their products."

elements.name: s11q141i1
elements.title: Do people expect their "Financial data" to be handled by your organization?

elements.name: s11q142i1
elements.title: Have people been notified that your organization handles their "Financial data" in this way?

elements.name: s11q143i1
elements.title:
Describe how people benefit by your organization handling their "Financial data."
Sample answer: "People only receive advertisements that are likely to interest them."

elements.name: s11q144i1
elements.title:
Describe how people could be harmed by your organization handling their "Financial data."
Sample answer: "People are not harmed by the organization's use of their personal information."

elements.name: s11q145i1
elements.title:
Overall, is it in people's best interest to have your organization handle their personal information? Explain why or why not.
Sample answer: "The organization's use of the personal information is in people's best interest because it increases their user experience. Nothing harmful occurs to them as a result."

elements.name: s11q146i1
elements.title:
Are the interests of the organization aligned with the interests of the people who the data was collected from? Explain why or why not.
Sample answer: "The interests are aligned. Customers only want to see advertisements they are interested in. The organization only wants to spend money on advertising to people who want to see relevant advertisements."

elements.name: s11q147i1
elements.title:
Are people able to do all of the following with regard to their "Financial data"?
1. Request access to their personal information

2. Request that their personal information be erased

3. Request that their personal information be corrected

4. Request that the organization stop using their data in a certain way

5. Object to how your organization handles their personal information

elements.name: s11q148i1
elements.title:
Based on your previous answers, do you believe your organization is justified in handling people's "Financial data"?
Weigh the benefits against the harms (or potential harms) of using the data.

Sample answer: "The organization is justified in using the personal information because the benefit to both customers and the organization is significant. There is minimal risk to the customers' privacy. The personal information is also important to third parties."

elements.name: s11q149i1
elements.title: Will your organization continue to handle people's "Financial data"?

elements.name: s11q150i1
elements.title:
We're done asking about the "Financial data."
If you're organization handles other types of personal information, we'll ask you about those. If not, we're almost done with the document.
